lead_paragraph: FULLER--Lee M.,Jr. The Council, past Presidents and members of The University Club mourn the passing of our esteemed friend and beloved former House Committee Chair Lee M. Fuller Jr., A.B., Princeton, '60; J.D., Columbia '65. Lee was our friend and confidant, a patriot and a gentleman. A man of great generosity, he was devoted to his family. He now has a commanding view of the track from above. Our most heartfelt condolences to his wife Vicki, to his son Scott, also a well-respected member of our Club, and to his entire family. Ave atque vale. The University Club 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  FULLER, LEE M.
